biolockj.module

Interface CountsReads

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BioModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PearMergeReads, RegisterNumReads, SeqFileValidator, TrimPrimers

    public interface CountsReads
extends BioModule
    Identifies modules that can report the number of reads per file in the metadata. Might be conditioned on Constants.REPORT_NUM_READS
    Author:
    ieclabau
